page.title: 13MODERN HOUSING. ELLESMERE
page.content: There are a lot of new houses springing up around Ellesmere.People are building new estates in the hope that more people will come and live in Ellesmere.That would probably mean bigger shops and facilities.New houses are built to suit the average family, with smaller rooms to make room for things everybody expects in a house. The council have built some new council houses along Scotland Street. These modern houses have all the things other houses have.All the new houses are built on the out skirts of Ellesmere because there is no room left in the centre of town.The newest estate in Ellesmere is Trimpley Court and the houses are very modern.
